DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesized that the video-laryngoscopes are beneficial for intubation of pediatric manikins while performing CPR. In the current study, we compared effectiveness of three video-laryngoscopes and Macintosh (MAC) laryngoscopes during pediatric resuscitation with and without chest compressions using an child manikin.
DOC.criteria: Give voluntary consent to participate in the study minimum 1 year of work experience in health care Not meet the above criteria Wrist or Low back diseases
